Header.title: NO PROJECT IS TOO LARGE OR TOO SMALL

About.paragraph: GrayCElectric is a family-owned electrical contracting firm rooted in Colorado Springs, CO. Established in 2014 by Jack Hollesen and Luke Hanson, GrayCElectric has flourished into a company boasting over 35 dedicated employees and an annual sales revenue exceeding $4.5 million.
Why: Systems Electric, Inc. was founded on the idea that customer service and the relationships with those customers are the utmost priority.

Services.name: Comprehensive Design Services
Services.text: From conceptualization to completion, we specialize in pre-construction budgeting/design and design/build new construction, employing leading engineers for quality assurance.

Services.name: Efficiency in Project Management
Services.text: We excel in adhering to budget and time constraints by leveraging our extensive knowledge, ensuring the latest technology implementation for optimal efficiency.

Services.name: Bid Submission Expertise
Services.text: Utilizing cutting-edge software, we provide competitive bids tailored to your project needs and offer value engineering solutions, optimizing your budget without compromising quality.

Services.name: Energy Studies and Compliance
Services.text: Our energy and load demand studies, aligned with NEC Article 220.87, use the latest metering equipment, enabling precise determination of existing loads for engineering purposes.

Services.name: Commercial and Light Industrial Services
Services.text: From pre-construction design to maintenance contracts, we cover a wide spectrum including ground-up construction, lighting retrofits, security systems, and more.

Services.name: Residential Expertise
Services.text: Catering to custom homes, remodels, electrical upgrades, and troubleshooting, we handle projects of any size, providing quality service and attention to detail.
